review: The Fire TV stick does a nice job when it's working, but is hampered by glitches and freezes. From a glitch standpoint, every other show I watch will have the picture freeze and the sound continue at some point. The only way I've found to fix this problem is to back out of the show and then resume it. Not a huge deal, but annoying nevertheless.As for freezes, occasionally the unit will lock up and not respond to any key presses from the remote. The only fix is to reboot the TV stick by unplugging it and plugging it back in.If Amazon can iron out these problems, it definitely deserves 5 stars.
author: JavaBarista

review: I can't believe how good this thing is!  Since I have Prime membership already, I figured I'd use it to watch movies and listen to music on my TV instead of just on my computer.  The remote has a very solid feel to it and it's simple design is a breath of fresh air, compared to the cable TV remote.  Well done, Amazon.  I'm a fan.
